case_title: Mehr ABDUR RASHID vs Ch. SHER ALI
allegations: Election procured through corrupt and illegal practices

key_findings.failure_to_deposit_fees: Petitioner failed to deposit process fee and diet money for summoning official witnesses.
key_findings.non_appearance_of_witnesses: Petitioner did not produce witnesses for cross-examination.
key_findings.negligence: Petitioner and counsel exhibited gross negligence in pursuing the case.

tribunal_decision.adjournment_request: Denied due to lack of sufficient cause.
tribunal_decision.evidence_closure: Petitioner's evidence closed due to procedural breaches.
